name: Front Porch Swing

ingredients.item: Square One Cucumber Vodka or Square One Botanical Spirit
White wine (sauvignon blanc, Sancerre, albariño or verdejo)

garnish: 1 Mint or tarragon (use the same herb as in the drink)
preparation:
Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill three-quarters of the way with ice.
Shake for 10 seconds and pour (unstrained) into a large wine glass.
Garnish with a mint or tarragon sprig.
